used.author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Despise not death, but welcome it, for nature wills it like all else.
Despise not life, but welcome it, for nature wills it like all else.
A personâ€™s worth is measured by the worth of what he values.
In the morning, when you rise unwillingly, let this thought be present: I am rising to the work of a human being.
